title: CULINARIA font id: monolinear sans w/ open R
content:
Looking for an id or a similar font that's used for the CULINARIA logo.

Any help greatly appreciated.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120301012244im_/http:/typophile.com/files/0000_culinaria_logotype-600x450_3794.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [0000\_culinaria\_logotype-600x450.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120301012244/http:/typophile.com/files/0000_culinaria_logotype-600x450.jpg) | 67.58 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content: Avant Garde Gothic? The L seems to be different, though.
No, I think this is something different. The R may have been customized for the logo.
